title: Build Approaches Classification & Dashboard Tab
prompt: Implement the following plan: Build Approaches Classification & Dashboard Tab. Classify all upstream font repos by build system and source format, generate JSON data, and add a new dashboard tab to visualize results. User also requested: keep updating the website gradually, add an intro explaining each approach, and document plans on the website with timestamps.
summary: Create a Python script to classify ~1,664 upstream font repositories by build approach (gftools-builder, fontmake, custom scripts, etc.) and source format (.glyphs, .ufo, .designspace, etc.), then add a new dashboard tab with charts, filters, and descriptions.

steps.description: Create scripts/classify_build_approaches.py - Python script that scans all repos in the cache and classifies by build system (11 categories, priority-based) and source formats (non-exclusive detection).

Run the script to generate data/build_approaches.json with summary stats and per-repo entries. Ran in degraded mode due to filesystem open files limit - stat-only probing. Source format detection limited.
Add Build Approaches tab to index.html with summary cards, canvas charts, description cards for each approach, filter bar, and data table.
Add CSS styles to css/style.css for builds tab: summary grid, chart containers, category badges, source format tags, description cards, table styles.
Add JavaScript to js/main.js: loadBuildApproaches(), chart rendering, filtering, table rendering, and category formatting functions.
Document plans on the website - created Plans tab with timestamps and original prompts.
Verify and test: ran classification script in degraded mode, validated JSON output. Full re-scan with source format detection pending filesystem recovery.
